title: Thunderbird 15 builds unable to select multiple folders
content: Build 115.4.2 (Windows x64 version) installed today and I found I was no longer able to select multiple folders in the left folder view to perform actions on. Neither CTL-click or SHIFT-click works. I tried rolling back to 115.4.1 and 115.3.3 but had the same problem. I finally reverted to pre-Supernova 102.15.1 and that fixed the problem. Any idea what the issue is with this operation in the newer builds?
creator: chris317

title: How Can I install the version previous to 115?
content: I am not a fan of the constant evolution of software (see below). Vers. 115 requires me to spend time and effort to re-learn software I had already pretty much mastered. I see no improvements I wanted and can use none of those I was provided efficiently. I wish to backdate my version of Thunderbird and lock that version in place. How can I do those two things?
creator: Larrydeb

title: Suddenly outgoing email stopped working
content:
I've been using Thunderbird for many years with no problem. I'm now on v. 115.4.2 (64-bit). Suddenly, I can no longer send email. This is the message I get:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <sy777@maine.rr.com> sender rejected. The email address you are sending as must match the email address you used to auth. Please check your SMTP settings. AUP#Out-1500. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again.

I contacted Spectrum and received their recommended settings. The only difference I have is that my Authentication is set to NONE and theirs to YES OR CHECKED

My incoming email works fine.

Please help!
creator: sy777

title: Thunderbird not syncing to IMAP server
content:
I often move emails in Thunderbird to various folders. However this movement is not reflected in the IMAP server unless I repair the .msf file multiple times.

Is there a way to achieve a permanent fix?

Thanks!
creator: vikram.vijayan

title: Missing 'On My Computer' Calendars
content: I've just upgraded from TB 91 to TB 115 and unfortunately all my 'local' calendars are missing and I cannot add them back either. By local I mean 'On My Computer'. There is no problem with my 'On The Network' calendars, both existing and new ones can be added. But when I click New Calendar > On My Computer > (fill in name) > Create Calendar... nothing happens... no new calendar appears.
creator: mark514

title: Recovery of my thunderbird account
content: The day about one month ago my account in Thunderbird stopped. Since the day my account of Thunderbird has never worked. My desktop pc is supported with Widows11. On the other hand another Thunderbird in my notebook pc continues to work. This Thunderbird is run by Tb of version 112, but Tb in the desktop pc by 115. I asked to help recover my account in desktop pc to my email Japanese provider, plala.or.jp. They has failed to recover the account. then they has given me "plala web mail" . Then I continue to enjoy email with "plala web mail" and Thunderbird account in notebook pc. But I want Thunderbird account in my desktop pc. I would like to ask you to help me in recovering Thunderbird account in desktop pc. Thnk you!
creator: sakishita9

title: Cannot send email (or CC) to myself from Thunderbird
content:
Maybe a week ago TB stopped letting me cc to myself, something I have always done in the past.

Either at the same time or more recently TB stopped letting me send email to myself, i.e. with my email address in the "to" line.

TB gets my email from Outlook. If I send email from the Outlook interface on the web and addressed to myself or cc'ed to myself it comes through to TB no problem.

I made no changes other than getting the latest version of TB: 115.4.2 (64-bit)
creator: symonjim

title: Thunderbird  is identifying all mail from the New York Times as Spam
content:
All messages I receive from "nytdirect@nytimes.com" are being identified as spam. I have added this address to "collected addresses" and enabled the option in junk mail settings but it still is identified. My DKIM extension reports that DKIM is valid and signed by NY Times. SPF is a pass and DMARC is a pass. I have enabled adaptive junk filtering and each time it comes in I click the "not junk" button.

I have enabled the adaptive junk filter logging but the log is always empty. Messages from other sources seem to be ok. My messages are being forwarded to me from DYNU's message forwarding service.

Any suggestions on what I can do will be greatly appreciated. Thank you
creator: subscribe

title: fails to download all messages
content:
new mail is not being downloaded for only One account press check mail, says account being processed a bit later I see Downloading 1 of 75 go to repair folder says failed because another operation is in process. then repair says it works I get 7 Identical messages delete them and try check mail again, The account peter is being processed. Please wait until processing is complete to get messages. press check mail, again I see Downloading 1 of 75

I shutdown thunderbird and restart, same routine.

This in not some phantom, I send a test mail to that account with my phone, and I see it arrive on my phone
creator: pls5116

title: Using message filter to forward as attachment
content: I have a persistent spammer who's sent me the same email approaching 300 times so far and has done so for weeks. I want to forward them automatically to SpamCop for reporting, but they require email submissions to include the spam as an attachment. I can't find a way to forward as attachment from a message filter.
creator: kwdavids1

title: Need compact density View for folder tree WHILE using spacious Default density View for message list & content
content:
With Thunderbird 115.4.2., the program no longer permits a compact density for the folder tree if you also need or prefer a more spacious ("default") setting for the emessage list and contents.

These spacing preferences should be separated...because the folder tree view does not change from minute to minute, so it does not need to be seen and studied as often. BUT the message list is constantly changing so users always need to at it more closely and frequently as messages are constantly arriving. 

  So more space more is more important for the message list than it is for the folder tree view.  And if you have many folders, as I do, you may want a more compact view of the folder tree to reduce need for constant scrolling....even though you may want--or need--an easy  to skim and see view of the message list, as I do.

After the redesign in the current version 115.4.25, it has now become either all too small, or all too spacious, but no longer possible to have a compact tree view for the folders and a more spacious or default view fpr the message list and contents. 

Can you please separate the density setting for the folder tree from the setting for the message list, or otherwise permit a setting that looks like "compact" for the folder tree list displayed at left, but also permits a more spacious, or "default" spacing for the message list when displayed horizontally above the message content?
creator: kmartinp

title: Can't delete messages
content:
Hey, I have tried the fixes on this page to no avail. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/cannot-delete-messages

If I can't rectify this it will be a deal breaker. Been at this several hours and at one point was very apoplectic but I got over it. Yours truly, Don

title: mancata ricezione posta in entrata
content: Non ricevo messaggi in entrata su thinderbird di un indirizzo di posta istituzionale. L' errore che mi da è il seguente: "E' in corso l'elaborazione dell'account. Attendere la fine dell'operazione per scaricare i messaggi" E successivamente " E' impossibile scrivere il messaggio nella cartella di posta. Controllare di possedere i permessi di scrittura nel file system e di avere spazio sufficiente per copiare la cartella di posta". Come faccio a risolvere il problema? abbiamo provato vari passaggi per la configurazione, anche a installare e disinstallare firewell e antivirus, senza successo. Grazie per la collaborazione
creator: AANTIB

title: Eventos del calendario han desaparecido en Thunderbird 115
content:
Hola a la comunidad.

Estoy preocupado con la actualización de Thunderbird y un problema que ha surgido en el calendario. Uso Thunderbird 115.4.1 (64-bit) en Debian.

Tras la actualización, no aparece ningún evento del Calendario, si bien la base de datos ubicada en la carpeta calendar-data no ha sufrido variaciones.

He intentado volver a la versión anterior, pero el problema se mantiene.

¿Qué puede estar ocurriendo?
creator: lan.free1989
